statements: SELECT * FROM international_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, product_catalog FROM international_vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%International%';
SELECT vendor_name, pricing_information->'price' AS price FROM international_vendors WHERE pricing_information->>'currency' = 'USD';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM international_vendors WHERE product_catalog IS NOT NULL ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, order_details FROM international_vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, product_catalog FROM international_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM international_vendors WHERE product_catalog LIKE '%electronics%' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, pricing_information->'unit_price' AS unit_price FROM international_vendors WHERE pricing_information->'currency' = 'USD' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(order_details->'products') AS ordered_product FROM international_vendors WHERE vendor_name ILIKE 'a%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors, COUNT(DISTINCT vendor_name) AS unique_vendors FROM international_vendors WHERE LENGTH(product_catalog) > 100;
SELECT vendor_name, country FROM vendors;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price, vendor_name FROM products JOIN vendors ON products.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_name, country, product_name FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id ORDER BY vendor_name DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE country='USA';
SELECT vendor_name, country FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id=10;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id=products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, price FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id=products.vendor_id ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id=products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING avg_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, country FROM vendors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM vendors JOIN orders ON vendors.vendor_id = orders.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_name, country FROM vendors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, quantity FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.product_id WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM vendors JOIN orders ON vendors.vendor_id = orders.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, country FROM vendors WHERE country='USA';
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products JOIN pricing ON products.product_id=pricing.product_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, total_price FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id=products.product_id;

SELECT vendor_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_sales FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id=products.vendor_id JOIN orders ON products.product_id=orders.product_id GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, country FROM vendors ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products JOIN pricing ON products.product_id = pricing.product_id WHERE price > 50;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, total_price FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) >= 5;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_country FROM vendors WHERE vendor_country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_category DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_country FROM customers WHERE customer_country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_country = 'USA';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_country FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, currency FROM products p JOIN prices pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
